Release notes for Kendo UI v2014.2.909

Components

What's new

  • Ctrl+click opens links in new tabs in IE/Chrome

Chart

What's fixed

  • Error when hovering notes on series with tooltips
  • Error when interpolating 100% stacked area series with missing values
  • JavaScript error when hovering scatter chart with corsshairs

Editor

What's fixed

  • Arrow keys do not navigate between blank paragraphs in IE11
  • The "Create a M x N table" hint cannot be localized

Globalization

What's fixed

  • kendo.toString outputs timezone offset with wrong sign

Grid

What's fixed

  • Fix incell editing with frozen columns IE9
  • Inconsistent behavior of the filter row when dataSource is defined outside the widget

Tooltip

What's fixed

  • The ToolTip is not automatically hidden on mouseleave when the ToolTip is initialized for a Button

TreeMap

What's fixed

  • TreeMap leaf text template should render html
